name: Yume - Web App
subtitle: a web application for videogamers.
description: Yume is a web application that allows users to create a own list of videogame. Users can insert videogame to our collection, mark them as finish or tu buy.
implementation: I had design the user interface with Sketch. For the backend I created an API with .NET Core, for frontend NextJS.

name: Desiderando - Web App
subtitle: a web application for your gifts.
description: Desiderando is a web application that allows users to create a own giftslists. Users can invite other users for let them know how they want for christmas, birthday or san valentine!
implementation: I had design the user interface with Sketch. For the backend I used Strapi, for frontend NextJS.

name: Strapi plugin membership light
subtitle: a simple plugin of strapi.
description: This plugin allows to integrate a membership system on your products into your ecommerce website
implementation: I had develop this plugin using strapi.

name: Crypto Wallet
subtitle: tool made by ethers.
description: This tool allows to see your found on matic or mainnet
implementation: I had develop this plugin using ethers and conditional tokens.

name: Collaboraction - Web and mobile app
subtitle: An app for the expense reports
description: This app allows to user to manage theirs expense reports
implementation: I had develop this app on my jon by SB Italia. We're using our home-made framework Agevole.
